description: Vivid Alt director Malachi Ecks struggles with the decision to continue shooting an ailing Dana DeArmond. Recovering from the night before, Dana presses on to finish her movie. Encouraged by a raw sex scene performed by Lorelei Lee and Daniel, Dana's critical hour arrives and a decision is made. Located in a San Francisco hotel room, the realities of gonzo porn and personal health merge for an unexpected ending.
title: Dana DeArmond Does The Internet Part II
